description: The Fundacion Imaymana, established in 2006, focuses on nature conservation and community well-being in Ecuador's Choc√≥ region. With a multidisciplinary team, the foundation integrates local knowledge and innovative practices across various axes, including education, conservation, gender equality, and food systems. Celebrating nearly 20 years of community engagement, Imaymana collaborates with local networks and international partners to promote sustainable practices, empower youth, and foster inclusive governance for a resilient future.
name: Fundacion Imaymana
